401.title: Unauthorized error
401.description2: a request to a website or server failed because it lacks valid authentication credentials, meaning the user is not logged in or has provided incorrect login information

403.title: Forbidden error/ Access Denied
403.description2: You don't have permission to access this resource

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Oopsie! Kitty {name} wasn't able to find that page! It seems there could be a typo in the http entry. Please return back and try your request again.
404.description2: wasn't able to find that page! It seems there could be a typo in the web address. Head back and give it another shot!

500.title: Server Error
500.description1: Something went wrong on our end. Kitty
